channel.title: Atonement revised
channel.description:
Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can't wait to initiate this perpetual experience.
- 24-7 online - No lag - Helpful friendly community - Dedicated Development Team - Tons of OSRS items - Professionally developed interfaces and timers - Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters - Clean, organized, easy to maneuver environment - 12 custom pets - Fully functional clan chat system - Instant PK by clicking stats to level, or trainer starter - Advanced account security system - Tons of unique and useful shops - Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching - Unique title system available to all players - 21 fully trainable skills - Free points system - Custom animations - Killstreak system - Slayer points with shop - PVP target system with points and shop - PK point system with shop - Challenge point system with shop - God system -Choose your alliance either with Zamorak or Saradomin -Gain reputation points by killing followers of the rival god. -Reputation points then can be used for combat advantages as the gods bless you in battle! - Tons of helpful commands - Clean tabs with useful information - OSRS bosses and monsters - Full Pest Control with points shop - Dark Crab fishing - Full fight caves - Full barrows - Full Warrior's Guild - Donation Point System with shop - Clean Website - Voting system with rewards -Points and shop - Strong Economy - In-game highscores - Fun-PK - Clean, functional orbs - Daily updates - Growing Community - Oldschool feeling - And much more! Come check it out for yourself!
[b]Download link[/b] https://www.dropbox.com/s/dkljmuld9c1cwzy/ReeterScapev1.jar?dl=0
(the source name is different because I was originally going to switch sources, but decided to stay with the old atonement, and I haven't had the chance to update the client or the cache yet)
MEDIA: Right now server is in Beta, so they're two modes, and it's easy to train and make money. This will change January 9th. We also need help, as there's much to do around the server. we currently do not have a website and are looking for a web dev.

item.title: Atonement revised
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can’t wait to initiate this perpetual experience.

  • 24-7 online
  • No lag
  • Helpful friendly community
  • Dedicated Development Team
  • Tons of OSRS items
  • Professionally developed interfaces and timers
  • Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters
  • Clean, organized, easy to maneuver environment
  • 12 custom pets
  • Fully functional clan chat system
  • Instant PK by clicking stats to level, or trainer starter
  • Advanced account security system
  • Tons of unique and useful shops
  • Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching
  • Unique title system available to all players
  • 21 fully trainable skills
  • Free points system
  • Custom animations
  • Killstreak system
  • Slayer points with shop
  • PVP target system with points and shop
  • PK point system with shop
  • Challenge point system with shop
  • God system
    -Choose your alliance either with Zamorak or Saradomin
    -Gain reputation points by killing followers of the rival god.
    -Reputation points then can be used for combat advantages as the gods bless you in battle!
  • Tons of helpful commands
  • Clean tabs with useful information
  • OSRS bosses and monsters
  • Full Pest Control with points shop
  • Dark Crab fishing
  • Full fight caves
  • Full barrows
  • Full Warrior’s Guild
  • Donation Point System with shop
  • Clean Website
  • Voting system with rewards
    -Points and shop
  • Strong Economy
  • In-game highscores
  • Fun-PK
  • Clean, functional orbs
  • Daily updates
  • Growing Community
  • Oldschool feeling
  • And much more! Come check it out for yourself!

Download link
https://www.dropbox.com/s/dkljmuld9c1cwzy/ReeterScapev1.jar?dl=0

(the source name is different because I was originally going to switch sources, but decided to stay with the old atonement, and I haven’t had the chance to update the client or the cache yet)

MEDIA:
Right now server is in Beta, so they’re two modes, and it’s easy to train and make money. This will change January 9th.
We also need help, as there’s much to do around the server. we currently do not have a website and are looking for a web dev.

http://gyazo.com/3cc2aad89d8a161289412acb66ff2dbe


Thanks, hope to see you ingame!
